## TinySynq.enableDebug() method

Writes debug mode value (true) which disables recording of operations on syncable tables.

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableDebug(): Promise<any>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;

Result of the operation.

## Remarks

The value set by this method is checked by dedicated triggers. If the value is `1`<!-- -->, the active trigger writes the data to the `*_dump` table. It's worth purging the table data once done with debugging.
